titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: COMPONENT REMOVAL INDICATOR (MODULAR HEAD) - Description

div.p: COMPONENT REMOVAL INDICATOR (MODULAR HEAD) is the same as attribute COMPONENT REMOVAL INDICATOR FOR JOINT REPLACEMENT to indicate whether any whether a Modular Head (a component used in metal-on-metal (MoM) total hip replacements) was removed during Revision Hip Replacement Surgery.
